description:
Very nice vim bindings, fast, thumbnails and multiple different ways to view the content. Good documentation. Customizible.

I love it
summary: My favorite image viewer that i recommend

description:
I was looking for a lightweight image viewer for viewing files in a directory and having crop feature. This fits the bill perfectly, loads better then the shotwell viewer.
They should add some overlay of controls which can be toggled off for new users, to show them simple commands
